name: Airship Path
description: A designated route for aerial transportation provides fast travel over difficult terrain. The aerial nature bypasses ground obstacles, while the specialized infrastructure and weather dependence create unique challenges and opportunities.
atmosphere: Airship engines hum while wind whistles through rigging high above the terrain below. The air carries the scent of wind, engine exhaust, and the promise of aerial freedom. Every surface feels the motion of weather-dependent flight. Your skin feels the wind's touch and the sense of aerial perspective. The taste of aerial freedom and weather vulnerability fills your mouth.
